content.prompt: Which of the following was an important consequence of the Glorious Revolution of 1688-1689 ?

choices.label: Limits were put on the power of the English monarchy.
The franchise was expanded to members of the lower classes.
England gained control of Spanish colonial possessions in the New World.

topic.text: 3.2: English Civil War and the Glorious Revolution

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
